cols = dict(zip([u'–', 'a', 'b', u'another unicode – –'], ['nominal'] * 4))
df = pd.DataFrame(data=self.string_ndarr, columns=cols)
df['ordinal'] = self.arr[::-1]
cols['ordinal'] = 'ordinal'
df['dep_v'] = self.arr
no_exception = True
try:
    CHAID.Tree.from_pandas_df(df, cols, 'dep_v', min_child_node_size=0
        ).print_tree()
except:
    no_exception = False
assert no_exception, 'Raised error while printing the tree'
